articles.author: SOPHENG CHEANG Associated Press
articles.title: Death toll surges as Cambodian building collapse search ends
articles.description: The death toll from the collapse of a building under construction in Cambodia has surged to 36, even as an additional survivor was pulled from rubble
articles.content:
PHNOM PENH, Cambodia -- 
The death toll from the collapse of a building under construction in Cambodia surged to 36 on Sunday, even as an additional survivor was pulled from rubble, officials said.
At least a dozen bodies were found in overnight operations … [+1767 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Venezuela's Guaidó faces key test in leadership vote
articles.description: Venezuelan opposition leader Juan Guaidó is facing an internal test of his authority as he campaigns to oust President Nicolás Maduro
articles.content:
CARACAS, Venezuela -- 
Venezuelan opposition leader Juan Guaidó faces an internal test of his authority in a key vote Sunday as he campaigns to oust President Nicolás Maduro and end Venezuela's economic and humanitarian crisis.
The opposition-controlled Nat… [+2845 chars]

articles.author: NASSER KARIMI and JON GAMBRELL Associated Press
articles.title: Soleimani's body arrives in Iran as Trump issues new threats
articles.description: The body of Revolutionary Guard Gen. Qassem Soleimani has arrived in Iran to throngs of mourners after the U.S. drone strike killed the commander
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
The body of Revolutionary Guard Gen. Qassem Soleimani arrived Sunday in Iran to throngs of mourners after the U.S. drone strike killed the commander, as President Donald Trump threatened to bomb 52 sites in the Islamic Republic if Tehran ret… [+4520 chars]

articles.author: Luis Martinez
articles.title: Trump warns cultural sites could be targeted if Iran retaliates for Soleimani strike
articles.description: Trump warns Iran cultural sites could be struck if Iran attacks, but the move would be a violation of international agreements calling that a war crime.
articles.content: President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter Saturday night that if Iran retaliates for the U.S. airstrike that killed Gen. Qassem Soleimani near Baghdad, the U.S. is prepared to "hit very fast and very hard" at 52 sites inside Iran, including some important to "t… [+3131 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Japan says Ghosn's escape inexcusable, orders investigation
articles.description: Japan's justice minister says the flight of former Nissan Chairman Carlos Ghosn as he awaited trial on financial misconduct charges was inexcusable and vowed to beef up immigration checks
articles.content:
TOKYO -- 
Japan's justice minister says the flight of former Nissan Chairman Carlos Ghosn as he awaited trial on financial misconduct charges was inexcusable and vowed to beef up immigration checks.
